Description: Sherd of floor of North Ionian black-figured pottery plate; slipped cream; interior: part of front leg and shoulder of deer to left and part of an incised rosette; underside reserved with graffito.
Curator's comments: Joins 1888,0601.557a-b; from the same vessel as 1924,1201.992-4. Pencil '121'.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1035)
